title: Charged Sheathe
markdown:
You sheathe your weapon or body in surging electricity. Make a Strike. You may replace all the physical damage this Strike deals with electricity damage. If you hit and deal damage, any attacks with metal weapons and electricity spells gain a +1 circumstance bonus to hit this target, and the target takes a -1 circumstance penalty on saves against electricity effects.

---
**Heightened (+4)** Increase the circumstance bonus and penalty by 1.
